statements: DELETE FROM WalletBalances WHERE user_id = 123 AND balance < 1000.0;
DELETE FROM Transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'credit' AND amount > 500.0 AND transaction_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'WITHDRAWAL' AND amount > 1000.00;
DELETE FROM wallet_transactions WHERE account_id = 100 AND amount < 0;
DELETE FROM wallet_updates WHERE updated_balance >= 1000 AND update_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM WalletTransaction WHERE user_id = '7b63ae08-f5a1-4fc7-b174-9c1c048b6245' AND transaction_type = 'withdraw';
